entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is a gamekeeper at Hogwarts and is being addressed by Dumbledore. He is described as having tears leak out down his cheeks and into his tangled beard.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student at Hogwarts who is asking Hagrid to come back and teach. She is described as speaking quietly.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is the headmaster of Hogwarts who refuses to accept Hagrid's resignation and expects him to return to work on Monday. He is described as standing up and speaking firmly.

entities.name: fang
entities.description: Fang is a dog that belongs to Hagrid and is being scratched by Dumbledore.

entities.name: great hall
entities.description: The Great Hall is the main dining hall at Hogwarts where Dumbledore expects Hagrid to join him for breakfast.
